value:
$nMEID_スカビオサ|How is it I'm working with Peony
now? Not that there's nothing to
like about it...

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I just know that Triandra and I will
grow closer and closer. We do have
a lot in common, after all...

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Mortals come in all kinds, so I think
there should be all kinds of dreams
to go along with them!

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|The álfar dream too, you know! Mine
is for everyone to get along, even if
they're a ljósálfr and a dökkálfr!

$nMEID_スカビオサ|I have no need for happy dreams.
No matter the dream, it always
comes to an end eventually...

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Hi! I'm Peony, and this is Triandra.
We've come to deliver dreams all the
way from $Nf's!

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I'm so happy! Even Triandra
is smiling! ...A little?
$nMEID_スカビオサ|Not so sweet this time...

$nMEID_スカビオサ|Nightmares tend to follow one
no matter where they go...
$nMEID_スカビオサ|This warmth...is somehow familiar...

Hi! We're álfar from the dream realm!
OK, Triandra, now it's your turn to
give your most energetic greeting...

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I've been thinking, Triandra... There
must be a reason the two of us were
summoned together.$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Reason? Unlike you, I bring only
nightmares and suffering to mortals.
What reason could there be?$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Well, nightmares aren't always bad...
A nightmare can change the future!$k$pIf someone had a nightmare, they
would want to be sure it never
became reality, right?$k$pSurely mortals could find good use
even for the worst nightmare.$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|You don't need to encourage her,
$Nu...$k$pEven so, while I'm here, I will share
your dream with you, if only for
a little while.
Yeah!
New year!
きゃああっ
Quit...
How violent...
$nMPID_二人|Happy New Year!
$nMPID_二人|This year we'll be— Together again.
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Wake up time!
$nMEID_スカビオサ|What, still asleep?
Fading...fast...
I've got my eye out.
Right behind you.
"Triandra!" "I'm here."
"No choice then." "Let's go!"
Will we get New Year's gifts?
"So pretty, Triandra!" "Th-thanks..."
On the right foot.
A new dawn!
My warmest greetings.
$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Happy New Year, Triandra!

$nMEID_スカビオサ|To you as well, Peony. I imagine this
time of year is rather busy for you.

They say the first dream after the
festival decides a person's luck for
the whole next year.

People must want to only see happy
dreams tonight. Your sort of dream...

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Oh, isn't it wonderful? I'll just have
to work my hardest!

$nMEID_スカビオサ|Yes, do it for me. I...am not quite
welcome at times like this. I'll try
to stay out of the way.

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Oh, Triandra... Hm... Oh, I know!
I've got the perfect thing.
$nMEID_スカビオサ|Perfect thing?

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I want to do everything I can to
bring people their happy dreams.

So...I want you to come with me!
Will you help me?
$nMEID_スカビオサ|Help you? Me? How?

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Because when I'm with you,
*I* feel happy!

You get it, right? After all,
you are—

$nMEID_スカビオサ|I am Triandra, the Nightmare.
The dreams I give people are...
not like yours.

But...if you'd like, I suppose
I can follow close behind.
For moral support.

$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Hooray! With you there, I know
I'll have no trouble at all!
